title.text:
Time Spent Reading by Students
A group of students recorded the time they spent reading.
Draw a line plot and answer the questions below.

1. How many students were there?
2. What was the longest time spent reading?
3. How many students read for less than 40 minutes?
4. What was the most common reading time?
5. How many more students read for 44 minutes than 60 minutes?
6. How many students read for more than 48 minutes?

Courtesy of JonAyves Learning Club
YouTube: @JonAyvesTV | Instagram: @AJsHouseKids
